Chef : Release Notes Older Versions
This page last changed on May 30, 2012 by btm.


Older Release Notes
This page contains release notes for older releases of Chef. For the latest version series (e.g., 0.10.0+), see Release Notes

Release Notes - Chef - Version 0.9.2 and 0.9.4

A backwards compatibility issue was discovered in 0.9.2, and 0.9.4 was released immediately.
